Text: Forgot to tell you need to install the game as administrator, and you do not most likely need to assign the game to a specific cpu unless the game freezes up.

THIS WORKS LIKE A CHARM!

Read the instructions, and set all executable files on Windows 98-mode, en run every exe. file as administrator. 

Then run 95.exe in 256 color modus, with 640x resoultion. Then it's running perfectly. :).
hey the instructions for win7 is blank?
